title: Drawing, "Textile Design:  Fish, Fowl, and Flowers", 1929
medium: Brush and black and gray ink, organ watercolor, silver gouache, graphite on heavy cream wove paper, ruled border in graphite
signed: Signed and dated, lower right:  Simon Lissim CK
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower left:  REPRODUIT EN COULEUR DANS/LE LIVRE, EDITÉ PAR LES/EDITIONS DU CYGNE; in graphite, upper left :  3
description: Design composed of abstract fish, roses, and rooster [?] in drop repeat creating a diaper pattern.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Textile Design:  Fish, Fowl, and Flowers", 1929.Brush and black and gray ink, organ watercolor, silver gouache, graphite on heavy cream wove paper, ruled border in graphite. 1936-38-1.
